name: Neolynx Group Inc.
tagline: Web Design, Marketing and Mobile App Development
description:
Neolynx specializes in the design, development, and optimization of business solutions that improve the effectiveness of marketing, product presentation, interactive transactions, customer relationship management, and everyday business procedures. It is a company dedicated to understanding the client’s market and developing capabilities that can deliver real, bottom-line results.
That said, at the end of the day,  it’s all about human relationships.
